original_title: Entre Cuba y MÃ©xico, todo es bonito y sabroso
overview: An account of the relationship of brotherhood between Cuba and Mexico led by an unprecedented interview with Eliseo Alberto Diego, Lichi that weaves together history, music, cinema, literature, and the character of both nations. Its also presents testimonies of diplomats, intellectuals, artists, athletes, educators and townspeople, who speak of this cultural fraternity.
title: Between Cuba and Mexico, Everything is Bonito & Sabroso
